14:05 <vmassol1> mflorea: hi. fyi I'm implementing generic marker support in the rendering engine  
14:05 <vmassol1> and a happy new year to everyone!  
14:06 <mflorea> vmassol1: cool, and happy new year to you too!  
14:10 <mbryant> has joined #xwiki  
14:10 <jvelociter> happy new year and happy new decade to XWiki and everyone !  
14:11 <mbryant> jvelociter: same to you happy new year  
14:20 <jvdrean> happy new year!  
14:24 <DrLou> Happy New Year (Bonne Année?) to all hear.  
14:24 <DrLou> is a new user of XWiki Enterprise...  
14:25 <vmassol1> DrLou: hope you like it so far…. ;)  
14:25 <DrLou> I do - very much - like it so far. Have it installed in GlassFish - as it's part of our bigger plans - and am beginning to get a handle on it...  
14:26 <vmassol1> cool

18:11 <vmassol1> sburjan`: hi  
18:11 <vmassol1> on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise27 there's a broken image  
18:11 <vmassol1> any idea why?  
18:12 <vmassol1> actually it's not sburjan` but sdumitriu  
18:12 <vmassol1> sdumitriu: it says [[image:XEColorThemeSpace.png]]  
18:12 <vmassol1> but the image isn't attached to the page  
18:17 <sdumitriu> vmassol1: Copy/Paste from the RC release notes without changing the image path?  
18:19 <vmassol1> sdumitriu: seems the link is missing from http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/  
18:19 <sdumitriu> What link?  
18:19 <sdumitriu> Ah  
18:19 <vmassol1> link to release notes for 2.7  
18:21 <vmassol1> thanks  
18:46 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
18:54 <jvdrean> has quit  
18:56 <jvelociter> Hi guys. Could someone help me and try to reproduce XWIKI-5848 (requires Internet Explorer 8)  
18:56 <jvelociter> IE8 )  
18:57 <+lucaa> jvelociter: I can, if you wait a 15, 20  
18:57 <+lucaa> I need to finish something and then I reboot  
18:57 <jvelociter> I could reproduce it, then disabled the XSS filter - which solved the issue - but now that I re-enabled the XSS filter it does not reproduce back :/  
18:57 <jvelociter> lucaa: cool, yes I can wait  
18:57 <+lucaa> wait, I would need a local instance, right?  
18:57 <+lucaa> that's gonna be hard :(  
18:58 <+lucaa> or... well no  
18:58 <+lucaa> we'll see  
18:58 <+lucaa> lemme finish this stuff first  
18:59 <jvelociter> lucaa: actually you can test it with any instance  
19:00 <jvelociter> (it's a IE8 bug - not ours ;)  
19:00 <jvelociter> so even xwiki.org will do it  
19:00 <+lucaa> ah ok  
19:00 <+lucaa> I thought I need a very recent version or smth  
19:00 <+lucaa> what's xwiki.org version, btw?  
19:00 <+lucaa> 2.5?  
19:00 <vmassol1> 2.6  
19:00 <vmassol1> patched 2.6  
19:01 <+lucaa> mmh  
19:01 <vmassol1> (AFAIR)  
19:01 <+lucaa> welcome back from holidays, vmassol1!  
19:01 <DrLou> With all this talk of updates, does XWiki have an auto-update capability?  
19:01 <vmassol1> lucaa: thanks  
19:01 <vmassol1> DrLou: yes and no  
19:02 <vmassol1> we automatically upgrade database when there are changes  
19:02 <vmassol1> however we don't currently have an auto update for pages yet  
19:03 <vmassol1> (we're working on one but it'll never be completely automated since you could have modified pages provided in the default XAR)
